data.question: What is the empirical formula for tp-PMBB-1-lon-e-NO2?
At what temperature (in Kelvin) was the crystal structure of tp-PMBB-1-lon-e-H determined?
What is the space group of tp-PMBB-1-lon-e-OMe?
How many independent reflections were collected for tp-PMBB-1-lon-e-OH?
What is the volume (in Å3) of the unit cell for tp-PMBB-1-lon-e-t-Bu?
Is the crystal system of tp-PMBB-1-lon-e-NH2 hexagonal?
Does tp-PMBB-1-lon-e-Br have a higher formula weight compared to tp-PMBB-1-lon-e-fdc?
Is the density (ρcalc) of tp-PMBB-1-lon-e-Me higher than that of tp-PMBB-1-lon-e-H?
What is the relationship between the final R indexes for tp-PMBB-1-lon-e-NO2 and tp-PMBB-1-lon-e-OMe?
data.answer: The final R indexes for tp-PMBB-1-lon-e-NO2 are higher than those for tp-PMBB-1-lon-e-OMe.
